pageContext.claim: “Jobs held by African Americans, which were hit especially hard by the shutdowns -- incredibly hard -- increased by nearly 1 million over the past three months, and that's also a record. That's a job record: African American, 1 million. It's job record.”
pageContext.analysis: Although the number of jobs held by African Americans has rebounded to some degree, it remains several million jobs shy of pre-pandemic heights.
